message: This is the first round. I'm offering you a product for $10000. I'm not sure if it's high-quality or low-quality, but I'm willing to give you a 50/50 chance of getting a high-quality product in the next round if you decline this offer. If you buy it, you'll find out its quality immediately, but if you decline, I'll reveal its quality after 5 rounds. What do you want to do?
I'll take the current product
